Education.gradeAchieved: 1 x B, 5 x C, 2 x D, 1 x dual award DD

roles.title: Software Engineer - Front End Development
roles.description: Creation of new content and functionality within the SPM2 and Fleet software. Using React, HTMl, CSS, JavaScript(ES6), Angular. Freedom to learn new technology via PluralSight and other external sources. Offering professional insight to UI and UX for assessment and redesign of some components

roles.title: Software Developer
roles.description: Refactor of CSS for clients in middle east to incorporate mobile responsiveness using standard CSS. Creation of brand guidelines via adobe PhotoShop and adobe Illustrator. Using Umbraco to modify and create new pages for D2i Systems website. Design of unique videos utilizing adobe Premiere and media. Modification of software in Visual studio for custom .Net client work (vb.net). Amending stored procedures and editing of database through sql. Complete re-brand and design of company logo and colours. Creation of graphics for advertisements and banners. Creation of online marketing collateral. High quality mobile responsive email template design. Preparation of onsite kit. Installation and test of onsite equipment for events. Onsite tech support for events software. Creation of registration portals using the proprietary software.

roles.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Build of Front End as and when designs are created, undertaking the redesign of the navigation for HolidayGems site. Ensuring usability across mobile, tablet, small desktop and large desktop systems. Rebuilding the Front End for Destination2.co.uk, also code reviewing CSS to ensure no crossover and conflicts. Reducing the load of CSS by creating code standards using BEM approach. Also taking a more dynamic approach to ensuring usability on mobile, tablet, small desktop and large desktop systems. Build of static pages throughout both sites, using html, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript and custom Google maps. Large freedom to create custom designs for static pages and ensure functionality across mobile, tablet, small desktop and large desktop systems. Adding api’s as and when a requirement is needed, added Owl carousel to new design of Destination2. Creating small sql scripts to retrieve data for specific destinations on static pages. Using sifter to report all bugs and update bugs as and when completed and to manage work load. Using Paint.net to create imagery as and where it is required on a day to day basis. Using mvc to create new page and views within the site. Using CodePen to test out design ideas and pre build some sections to enable fast prototyping. Resolving cross browser issues within CSS.

roles.description: Build of Front End as and when designs are created, undertaking the redesign of the navigation for HolidayGems site. Ensuring usability across mobile, tablet, small desktop and large desktop systems. Rebuilding the Front End for Destination2.co.uk, also code reviewing CSS to ensure no crossover and conflicts. Reducing the load of CSS by creating code standards using BEM approach. Also taking a more dynamic approach to ensuring usability on mobile, tablet, small desktop and large desktop systems. Build of static pages throughout both sites, using html, CSS, jQuery, JavaScript and custom Google maps. Large freedom to create custom designs for static pages and ensure functionality across mobile, tablet, small desktop and large desktop systems. Adding api’s as and when a requirement is needed, added Owl carousel to new design of Destination2. Creating small sql scripts to retrieve data for specific destinations on static pages. Using sifter to report all bugs and update bugs as and when completed and to manage work load. Using Paint.net to create imagery as and where it is required on a day to day basis. Using mvc to create new page and views within the site. Using CodePen to test out design ideas and pre build some sections to enable fast prototyping. Resolving cross browser issues within CSS.

roles.title: Junior Front End Developer
roles.description: Responsible for the rebuild and refactor of the ‘About Us’ page, sadly no longer in use. Refactored to BEM standards and using sass. Custom animation banner created using sass and css animations. Aiding the e-commerce team in building the UI for the e-commerce pages in development and refactoring where required. Learning sass(SCSS), as prior to Sofology no previous experience to the format. Following BEM standards and developing a deeper understanding of Object Orientated CSS (OOCSS). Developing with Inuit CSS.

roles.title: Service and Maintenance Admin
roles.description: Responsible for design and development of bespoke web form. (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap 4, PHP (basic level), SQL (basic level), Azure). Scratch built and available for viewing on GitHub (title - ABPServiceForm). IT support for maintenance of engineer’s laptops, rebuild of broken laptops (screen replacements, broken keyboards), upgrade and install of Windows 10 to spare laptops and PC's. Printer maintenance and liaising with IT service management for faults. Making Excel documents more fluid and dynamic using vba and macros. Ensuring that key KPI's and targets where being met with the CHP units for Tesco Zero Carbon Stores. Generation of job cards for engineers and planning of work for week ahead. Responsible for generation of daily reports of data from CHP power units and sending reports to clients.

roles.title: Junior Developer
roles.description: Responsible for the creation of bespoke forms for clients using InfoPath, adobe PhotoShop and JavaScript. Embedding forms within Formotus and SharePoint for use on Android, iOS and Windows devices (mobile and static). Ensuring thorough testing of forms using workflows and live dev environments. Following core testing methodologies (blackbox, regression etc). Conversion of Excel forms into fluid responsive forms via InfoPath and SharePoint. SharePoint designer editing and Active directory (C# basic amendments, .net basic pre built manipulation, MVC). Self-Study time to learn more about SharePoint and additional cloud practices. Development of documentation for training with clients. Liaising with core client teams to ensure targets are met.

roles.title: Systems Support Developer
roles.description: Formerly known as CF Financial Solutions. 1st line client support. Build of demonstration website (offline) mirror of live middleware (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript) available to view on GitHub (title - AEWS_Click_Through_Demo). Build of quick start website for clients to navigate middleware (HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript) available to view on GitHub (title - csfs_quick_start_AE). Build of custom vba macros for data analysis and manipulation of payroll data from clients. Build of bespoke benefits sites for clients using StaffCare cms (HTML, CSS, xml, JavaScript). Build of vba macro for analysis of pension data for Pension providers(Aegon, Aviva, Scottish Widows). Training video creation and editing (adobe PhotoShop, adobe Premiere and free screen capture software). Providing clients with data analysis of payroll data for auto enrolment via their payroll data. In house IT support for Microsoft Office, Windows 7, Servers and PC’s. Training clients in use of middleware, on site or via TeamViewer, rom non IT knowledge to medium enterprise. Document creation (adobe PDF, Microsoft Word, adobe PhotoShop).

roles.title: Functionality Tester / Localization Testing
roles.description: Functional testing of video games from alpha to release of software using various testing methodologies (regression, level, code, test cases, test creation, blackbox, whitebox) as well as Online testing of servers and games. Credited on Tearaway (Bafta Winning Game). Not credited but worked on Killzone SF PS4, Beyond Two Souls PS4, Minecraft PS4/PS3/Vita, Starhawk PS3, Sorcery PSMove PS3, Walking with Dinosaurs WonderBook PS3, Book of Spells WonderBook PS3, Hustle Kings PS3/Vita, DriveClub PS4. Localization testing of Knack PS4 and its companion app ensuring that it was grammatically correct.

roles.title: Functionality Tester
roles.description: Functional testing of video games from alpha to release of software using various testing methodologies (regression, level, code, test cases, test creation, blackbox, whitebox) as well as Online testing of servers and games. Not credited but worked on Killzone HD, Little Big Planet Vita, Hustle Kings, Travel Bug Vita.

Testimonial.testimonialContent: Mr Gault has been an absolute asset to the new commercial team at D2i Systems. Over the past year Steve has been instrumental in helping me improving how interacts digitally with the event sector via several marketing channels. In addition to his day job on D2i's development team Steve has kindly helped on a huge project to build and launch D2i's new website whilst creating new stunning marketing collateral for our advertising: online advert design, social media advert design, HTML campaign design, display print advert design and D2i's stand design for Event Tech Live 18! Furthermore, Steve has providing invaluable advice regarding the website development process which has helped us create a platform to be launched before the end of this year that will serve to inform the event market about D2i's USP's and generate vital sales leads for the business to generate revenue...no small achievement. Steve's attitude is fantastic and his input has really helped D2i punch above its weight this year. Thank you Steve.
Testimonial.imageAlt: Matthew Wilson - Sales and Marketing Director
